vendor_name: Hôtel de la Cité Carcassonne - MGallery Collection
title: Southern France Historic Escape One Hour From Toulouse with Two Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Perched like a royal jewel in the medieval citadel of Carcassonne, this property is where fairytale meets knockout views with ancient fortified walls that have stood sentinel since the 3rd century. Nestled in a UNESCO World Heritage site that once witnessed the Albigensian Crusade, this hotel breathes history from every stone.

Get ready to indulge at Michelin-starred La Barbacane, serving up top-tier cuisine in serene suroundings. Tucked romantically in the garden at the foot of Saint-Nazaire Basilica, the pool is pure Mediterranean magic. After exploring the historic city, the Cinq Mondes Spa is waiting to melt away your stress with blissful treatments.
